text:
Quick Question about *CSS and JS dependencies in custom modules*.

Say I have 2 modules that depend on a lightbox library and those js & css files are set as dependencies in both modules.  If i have both modules on one template are those dependencies included once or are they included twice?
Per the <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/building-blocks/modules/files|docs>, they are _only loaded once per page, even if more than one instance of the module appears in a page_.
use require_js and require_css for that Jon or add them as linked files in the module.
That’s how you get separate modules to share the same code without ever loading it more than once
Okay thanks, I had read that page but it wasn't clear if that also applied to dependencies or just to the module's css
So this was acually on me – I didn’t have the font extension (.woff2) in the url
